data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Jon Moss awards Man City a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Raheem Sterling gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man City.
Man City drive upfield and Riyad Mahrez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fulham defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
In the minute 5, Goal! Raheem Sterling gives Man City a 1-0 lead.
Kevin De Bruyne instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, In Manchester, Ademola Lookman of Fulham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
Man City's Joao Cancelo misses with an attempt on goal.
Fulham have a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Man City.
Kevin De Bruyne of Man City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
In Manchester Man City attack through Ilkay Gundogan. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Fulham at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 18, Free kick Man City.
Can Man City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
Throw-in for Man City close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Man City to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Man City.
In the minute 23, Jon Moss signals a throw-in for Man City, close to Fulham's area.
Man City are pushing forward but Rodri's finish is wide of the goal.
Fulham have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Jon Moss signals a Man City throw-in in Fulham's half.
Man City have been awarded a penalty in Manchester...
Kevin De Bruyne gives Man City a 2-0 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 27, Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Fulham.
Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa's header is off-target for Fulham.
Ball goes out of play for a Man City goal kick.
In the minute 32, Man City's Raheem Sterling is on target but unsuccessful.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Free kick for Man City in the half of Fulham.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Man City.
Jon Moss awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
In the minute 39, Man City have a dangerous throw-in.
Jon Moss awards Man City a goal kick.
Jon Moss signals a Man City throw-in in Fulham's half.
In the minute 45, Important block from the Fulham defence as Raheem Sterling fires in a strike for Man City.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Etihad Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Etihad Stadium.
Throw-in for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Man City.
Man City needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
So close for Man City as Kevin De Bruyne's shot comes back off the post.
Man City are coming forward and Kevin De Bruyne gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 50, Goal kick for Fulham at Etihad Stadium.
Corner awarded to Man City.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
In the minute 53, Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Fulham.
Kevin De Bruyne for Man City drives towards goal at Etihad Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In the minute 58, Man City drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Man City in Manchester.
Can Man City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
In the minute 60, In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jon Moss signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Man City's area.
Jon Moss awards Fulham a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Fulham to take a throw-in in Man City territory.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Man City's Kevin De Bruyne gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Fulham advance rapidly upfield but Jon Moss blows for offside.
Attention is being given to Fulham’s Tosin Adarabioyo and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 68, Fulham make their first substitution with Mario Lemina replacing Harrison Reed.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Ruben Dias for Man City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 70, Fulham have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 72, Tosin Adarabioyo for Fulham is back on the field again.
The away team replace Bobby Reid with Aboubakar Kamara.
Goal kick for Fulham at Etihad Stadium.
Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ola Aina of Fulham gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 75, Man City have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
Fulham drives forward and Ivan Cavaleiro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 77, Free kick Man City.
Man City's Ruben Dias breaks free at Etihad Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Fulham at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
Fulham's Ivan Cavaleiro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jon Moss awards Man City a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Throw-in Fulham.
Tom Cairney is on a sub for Ruben Loftus-Cheek for Fulham.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Man City.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
In the minute 87, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Fulham have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
Jon Moss signals a Man City throw-in in Fulham's half.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Jon Moss awards Man City a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
